description: Warm, lumberjack shirt in functional wool blend with comfort fit. Push buttons in the front, on the sleeve cuffs and on the pocket flap. Both breast pockets are positioned slightly lower than on other shirts to make it easier to reach them. Can be worn either for casual wear or in the mountains, and as a lightweight shirt jacket or an insulating intermediate layer under normal shell garments.
name: Fjallraven Canada Shirt Solid - Mens
